channel.title: Reputation
channel.description: I've been repped many times and my rep hasn't gone up once, can someone help and check?

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:111, topic:436372”]It’s working for everyone else besides the author. Can someone test rep-- on the author for me?

@Davidi2
Why are you so worked up about the rep abuse? This is MoparScape, it’s never going to change. We will always abuse rep, everyone will get 200 rep for creating a shitty tutorial for a wL based server or PI. We never give the rep someone actually deserves here.[/quote]

Read full topic

while im the topic of movies, david is like the leader of the jets and I am the leader of the other guys. plenty of people dont like david but in the end we will fight to the death in beautiful combat (where we both die) and we both die. sweet sweet combat. a little dancing. of course his foot works is a bit slow but you know, i just got the mad skillz. do the two step around his lame prom two step. oh wait he didn’t go to prom. heh. two step. anyway, two step.

item.title: Reputation
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:78, topic:436372”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=539087.msg3946987#msg3946987 date=1331951689]
– works on arham and the OP
[/quote]

Now everyone, watch Ranger Squad be the only one to get infracted for rep abuse.[/quote]
Haha, i bet anything that will happen.

[quote=“sinisoul, post:86, topic:436372”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539087.msg3947017#msg3947017 date=1331954216]
And I find this community interesting… I guess this is the monthly troll from a mod to a normal user(think I saw 2).
Hard to find a definition for moderator for this type of site but this is one of the closest things I could fine I guess(haven’t actually read it within the past 6 months, but I remember using this link to show a mod what the definition is a long time ago) http://www.marketingterms.com/dictionary/moderator/

  • Seems to be a lot of idiocy from users in this thread also.
    I’m cranky and tired but yeah this is what I’m thinking right now about this thread.
    [/quote]

join in or gtfo[/quote]
Yep.

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:90, topic:436372”]@Jmood Just so you know, commenting on my post shows you care.

@sinisoul lol

@aff suck my mother fucking dick.

@Davidi2 i don’t care that much what you do to him, he’s some random to me. I was just surprised at how many people are doing it, dereppping someone when you know they care is harsh? its not his fault he did a stupid action, no need to be harsh about it.
You could say that indeed, but as you were neglecting half the things I said I doubt you’d fully grasp what I was trying to portray to you so I’d expect you to think I’m arrogant if you don’t understand what I was trying to tell you, if you didn’t notice I put a little bit more effort into each pm for you trying to explain to you until eventually I got pissed of however you were just going in circles so excuse me for thinking its possibly the other way round if anything. I am a spoil sport in this case indeeed! 3mods doing something harsh doesn’t make it right you know?
I wanted to post, so I posted. I didn’t want to de-rep so I didn’t, I don’t need you telling me I can do what I want, I do what I want.
I wonder, if anyone actually thought about his feelings? He wants rep badly enough to make a thread like this whats to say he wouldn’t cry about loosing it all, hmm?
Also, I know that however your saying that from a position the poster is somebody I’ve never even see most before. Maybe they think they’ll get recognised if they have rep, god knows. Oh and yes, thatw as an assumption in case you forgot the word I apparently taught you.[/quote]
Epic longness that im too lazy to read. prob arguing with David about something.

chillwitm888:

Bumps. In Beta.

Oh?

BETA IS OUT! EVERYONE NEEDS TO RETEST!

Read full topic
